title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Veterans	

Issued on:
July 30, 2019
On Tuesday, July 30, 2019, the President signed into law:S. 504, the “Let Everyone Get Involved in Opportunities for National Service Act or the “LEGION Act,” which expands dates of service for eligibility in the American Legion to any time after
December 7, 1941.
